results.title: [Tirzepatide (Mounjaro ) : a GIP/GLP-1 receptor dual agonist for the treatment of type 2 diabetes].
results.text_hl: Tirzepatide is now refunded under conditions in Belgium for the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Thanatophoric_dysplasia_type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536508 @@@TD2@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with a body mass index >= 30 kg/m2 and a HbA1c level > 7.5 % with antihyperglycaemic therapy including @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.
